short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Audit pages for accessibility bugs as they're being used.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Continuously monitor accessibility failures in a page as it's being used, rather than a single audit on page load. View a log of all failures in the console and monitor new failures via a badge on the icon in the toolbar.
